definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: The promise of fuel cells for efficient, eco-friendly power generation has become a reality.
sentences.chinese: 承諾燃料電池的效率高，環保型發電已成爲現實。

sentences.english: It is also an eco-friendly car that protects the environment.
sentences.chinese: 它也是一種環保型汽車，保護環境。

sentences.english: The invention discloses an environment protective type double air duct ventilator.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種環保型雙風道吸油煙機。

sentences.english: With green environmental protection decorates material, give you a healthy sweet home.
sentences.chinese: 以綠色環保型家飾質料，給你一個康健溫馨的故里。

sentences.english: How to choose green and environment-friendly inverters?
sentences.chinese: 如何選擇綠色環保型的變頻器？

sentences.english: Environmentally friendly automobile coating is the development trend.
sentences.chinese: 指出了環保型汽車塗料是發展趨勢。

sentences.english: Vegetable oil flowable concentrale is an environmental protection type formulation.
sentences.chinese: 植物油懸浮劑是一種環保型農藥劑型。

sentences.english: Lead-free solder wire is one kind of environmental-friendly product with good stability.
sentences.chinese: 無鉛錫線是一種環保型，穩定性很好的產品。

sentences.english: Super-fine magnesium hydroxide powder winch surface is treated is a kind of environment-friendly fire-retardant of polymer.
sentences.chinese: 超細活性氫氧化鎂是一種重要的環保型阻燃材料。

sentences.english: Besides, without dust and noise, this machine is environmental oriented.
sentences.chinese: 該機是環保型機器，無粉塵和噪音污染。

sentences.english: The newly-developed eco-friendly products are a cash cow to the company.
sentences.chinese: 新開發的生態環保型產品給公司帶來很高的利潤。

sentences.english: It is a national major strategic policy to build energy-saving land-saving environmental protection type house.
sentences.chinese: 建設節能省地環保型住宅是國家的重大戰略決策。

sentences.english: Raw bamboo fiber is a green and environmental protection fiber, it is made through physical method.
sentences.chinese: 竹原纖維是通過物理方法生產的一種綠色環保型纖維。

sentences.english: Super-fine magnesium hydroxide powder which surface is treated is a kind of environment-friendly fire-retardant of polymer.
sentences.chinese: 超細活性氫氧化鎂是一種重要的環保型阻燃材料。

sentences.english: Water dispersible granules (WDG) are an advanced, environmentally friendly pesticide formulation.
sentences.chinese: 水分散粒劑是一種先進環保型的農藥劑型。

sentences.english: Ruian Xinchangda Machinery factory is a professional manufacture producing environmental protecting paper forming equipment.
sentences.chinese: 系機器製造企業，專業生產環保型紙類成型機械設備。
